name: Career Day: Life sucks and then you die
name_original: Career Day: Life sucks and then you die
description:
Welcome to Career Day where you will get the chance to sample a variety of careers. Featuring multiple endings for each career you encounter and plenty of surprises along the way. This is a game full of dark comedy and will interest you as long as you have a messed up sense of humor. 

Any questions, comments or bugs you come across you can reach me at winknowsgames@gmail.com
